nodes.long_description:
Quest 2 Game made in Unity with the Cesium Package using the Google Earth Photogrammetry 3d Tiles.

---------------------------------------------
UPDATE v10 !! : hopefully the MOST STABLE and the Update that Simplified the Flight Controlling Mechanic the Most, v10 is meant to finalize the heavy game development for a month or two, however, fixes and improvements will still come if there are any needs for it. this Update adds Controller SUPPORT!!! basically the rest is self explanatory, the update also fixes a bug that due to the collider removal and raycast to prevent going through mesh, even if the Earth's Mesh was not visible in Space, it was still there, so the raycast stopped Player Movement when trying to go down, this was Fortunately FIXED!,

v10.2: the Controllers are now Able to Type on Keyboard to Search and Teleport to a specific Place on Earth, and fixed a bug where the space bar touch collider was small,

v10.3: when you pressed on some specific ui buttons, the code gave an error and every other ui stopped working since they had the same script. this was fixed. 3d Earth Generation to have better quality and faster performance, also loading faster and in larger quantity, we'll have to know if that's the case, if not we'll have to redo the changes in v10.4 :/, another improvement was that flight speed adjustment based on altitude was not efficient, and sometimes caused teleporting instead of flying smoothly, fixed !
https://youtu.be/6s-jkai4_mA
---------------------
nodes.short_description: geography teaching hand tracking passthrough VR app/game on Quest 2 Quest Pro, and Quest 3

nodes.change_log:
The v47 launch is here!

# Street View improvements 🥽

- **The nearby Street View range has been increased** 📡 The new nearby imagery range has been carefully refined to balance spatial awareness and convenience. This removes the potential inconvenience of no available close imagery, without compromising speed whatsoever.

- Faster overall loading times with the ‘Auto’ quality mode.

- Improved performance during 8k loading when using the ‘Auto’ quality.

- Improved Street View navigation, offering more versatile and intuitive controls. 

- Street View now utilizes captured camera orientation for alignment when capture angles are uneven.

# Massive Space Update 🚀

- A new, more comfortable and intuitive way of navigating the world from Space has been introduced and brings a 3 dimensional, refreshed exploration experience.

- The new, highly-optimized location database allows fine control over performance, visualization, animation and other visual effects - producing a smoother and exponentially higher quality experience.

# Atmosphere Implementation ☀️🌐

- Deeply integrated atmosphere, seamlessly covering the surroundings when nearing Earth from Space, forming the Sky.

- Because it’s an all-inclusive system, it also simulates atmospheric scattering, creating a natural horizon glow.

- Thanks to the full Space-Earth integration, transitioning between the two is now truly 100% seamless. Not only that, but this also produces truer sky colors on Earth!

# Design Improvements ⚜️

- Keyboard has been redesigned from the ground up! Mainly used in ‘Search for Place’, the in-app keyboards have received the new, absolutely stunning WL design treatment 🔥

- A more subtle and careful UI design polish everywhere else for absolute symmetry and looks.
 
# New Input Mode 🕹️

- These controls have been requested quite a lot, and have now been added in v47.

- It’s thumbstick-based, so the previous ‘Thumbstick’ has been split into two Input Modes and behaves as a toggle between the two: Thumbstick (Hybrid Controls), Thumbstick (Traditional Controls).

Both follow the same input scheme, so in short: 

Hybrid works as before, allowing the dominant stick to be used entirely on its own or for rotation with non-dominant stick movement.

Traditional provides standard 6DoF VR controls, with the dominant stick dedicated to vertical movement and the non-dominant stick handling all horizontal-plane movement.

# Additional 🔧

- Improved performance and potentially faster 3D loading times.

- Improved memory usage stability.

- ‘Motion Vignette’ is now used for turning using ‘Smooth Rotation’ as well.

- Solved a Street View navigation distance selection bug with ‘Scale’ values other than ‘Human-Size’. **I deeply apologize for any inconveniences caused.**

- Fixed loading issues potentially caused by rate limitations.

- Fixed another, smaller issue with Street View ‘No Image Found’ visibility management.

- The Street View experience should now be more stable by default. Increasing the ‘Display Resolution’ will now give an appropriate warning when over 1.6x.

- The culling system which activates when Haze densifies near the ground, has been further expanded to prevent rare instances where very distant (but visible) mountains or hills were removed.

- The Thumbstick Input Modes now offer 100% smooth movement across all axis, eliminating any noticeable axis snapping.

- Improved Haze rendering, offering more natural densification and improved nearby visibility.

- Around noon, Haze now offers slightly clearer far away visibility when near the ground, continuing realism across times of days.

- Fixed a rare bug that triggered unintended UI presses under very specific conditions.

- Fixed some teleportation animations being interrupted whenever the keyboard was closed.

- Fixed a bug where the sun could noticeably reflect under the horizon more than once.

- New Soundtrack! Give it a listen! https://youtu.be/8GekDeuNOE8

- Improved UI stats like Altitude and Scale to offer better preview values.

- Terrain Quality Range => 3D Quality Range
- Terrain Loading Strength => 3D Loading Strength

- And more!

———

I’ve tested everything as well as I could (and will continue to), but if you encounter **ANYTHING** that you may think isn’t 100% intentional, please **LET ME KNOW!** 🎧
